short_summary: Provide Building Condition Reports for Campobello Island and Clair CBAs
description: Provide BUILDING CONDITION REPORTS FOR THE ABOVE MENTIONED PROJECT
full_summary:
# Building Condition Report (BCR) Services for CBSA Facilities in New Brunswick

## Tender Details

**Reference Number**: WS4252556466
**Solicitation Number**: WS4252556466
**Publication Date**: October 11, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: October 26, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)
**Expected Contract Start Date**: November 15, 2023

## Procurement Method

This procurement process uses a Competitive - Selective Tendering method, where proposals will be evaluated based on a combination of Technical Merit and Price.

## Selection Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated on a Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

## Contracting Entity

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions related to this tender, please contact:
Timothee Beausoleil, 2
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
Email: [timothee.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:timothee.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Overview

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking proposals from consultants to provide Building Condition Reports (BCR) for the following facilities:

* Campobello Island CBSA, NB
* Clair CBSA, NB

The scope of services includes providing accurate and comprehensive BCRs for each facility.

## Requirements

Please note that this tender is being conducted under Supply Arrangement E0225-152290.

**UNSPSC Code**: 81101508 (Architectural engineering)

**Procurement Category**: CNST
**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Dates**

* **Publication Date**: October 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 26, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 15, 2023

**Important**

Tenders were only supposed to be made through a selective process. Companies who received an invitation are invited to participate and submit their proposal.
